explains: n. 高度，海拔；立面，立视图；提拔，提升；增加，升高；高地，高处；（枪炮的）射角，仰角；空中动作技巧
wordGroup: elevation angle 仰角；倾斜角；升运角
ground elevation 地面高程；室外地面标高；地面海拔
boiling point elevation 沸点升高

sentences.en: The city is at an elevation of 2 000 metres.
We're probably at an elevation of about 13,000 feet above sea level.
sentences.cn: 我们很可能在海拔13000英尺的高度。

sentences.en: As elevation increases, narrow, deep channels of water form throughout the marsh.
sentences.cn: 随着海拔的升高，沼泽中形成了又窄又深的水渠。
